content: i love shawls and shawlettes and crescent-ish shaped scarves but what i don t like about the top-down structure is the fact that the row get crazy long at the end so i started playing around with a point-to-point scarf that works the bottom border as you go it s admittedly a very simple pattern but there is nothing wrong with simple things simple things can still possess beauty and elegance this pattern comes with two variations one is a trapezoidal scarf first picture and the other is a shallow triangular shawlette second picture both are simple patterns to remember work up in a flash and use only a single skein of yarn--although nothing is stopping you from making it bigger if you like a video tutorial of this pattern is available here 1 courtesy of fiberspider he s also got a mod of the design that incorporates the double shell border like in the vicki scarf with this design available here 2 thanks so much fiberspider **items made from my patterns are intended for personal use sale or world domination--as long as i get a parking space wherever i want once the world is yours ** 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=nr1pxwlwffc&t=0s 2 https //www youtube com/watch v=hulysziefo4
